Description: The plague of frogs: Pharoah sitting on the left under a canopy supported with pillars, remonstrating with two men standing before him as a plague of frogs covers the land of Egypt, with Aaron on the mountain top holding out his staff seen in the distance through a door on the right; in a folate border. Etching and engraving
Curator's comments: Probably for Rider's 'Christian's family Bible, for which see 1873,1213.513
Acquisition name: Donated by: Miss A E Hewett
